name: Ash and Tor: Yuma's Quest
description:
Too difficult? Try the Easy "Chicken" Mode
Don't be too harsh, it's my very first game!

Explore the dungeons and try to find and save the Queen Yuma... but wait: it's almost an impossible dungeon. And why? Because it's easy to say: you must move two knights at once!!! Are you ready to find and save tons of girls without dying?
 


MAIN FEATURES:

  • Real-time action game (like roguelike) with simple puzzle solving mechanics;
  • 1 controller/keyboard allows the player to move 2 characters simultaneously;
  • 5 languages available (english, italian, french, german, spanish);
  • 18 levels (plus other 6 in the next update), 6 rest areas and 3 bosses;
  • 30 available items (unlockable by winning) that allows you to boost your characters;
  • 35 girls to rescue across dungeons (plus 29 will be added in the next update).
 


OTHER FEATURES:

  • So... HARD!!!
  • Every character got unique special move (activable by spending coins);
  • Normal/hard difficulty (plus chicken mode for beginner - hard difficulty has inverted movement);
  • Gambling system to get items;
  • Incoming updates, so stay tuned!
 
This game is either in early access and open to suggestions, so contact me if you want to add something into game.
Thanks to your ideas I will carry on this project and you will be included in the game credits, so remember to sign at the end of your e-mail.
 
FINAL CONSIDERATIONS:

I am a full-time worker and in the little free time I have I also have to study, but... with your contribution and support what I would like to do is continue to develop video games (as well as update this one!), so I thank you in advance now for your possible purchase, but also for a simple donation or an e-mail containing improvements to be made to the game. Thank you all!
Mauro
